import './Header.scss' import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-scroll"; import Button from '..components/Button/Button'; const Header = () => { const [openedMenu, setOpenedMenu] = useState(false) const router = useRouter() let themeClass = '' if (router && router.pathname !== '/') { themeClass = 'white-navbar' } useEffect(()=>{ setOpenedMenu(false) },[router.pathname]) const toggleMenu = () => { setOpenedMenu(!openedMenu) } return ( <>
